alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Pepin; Pierce; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 2:36PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pepin, eastern Pierce, southern Dunn and southeastern St. Croix Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 236 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Ellsworth, or 7 miles north of Red Wing, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elmwood around 255 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Knapp, Menomonie, Elk Mound and Colfax. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 33 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
